name: CI

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: ["dev"]
  push:
    branches: ["dev"]

jobs:
  lint-test-build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    services:
      mysql:
        image: mysql:8.0
        env:
          MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
          MYSQL_DATABASE: test_db
        ports:
          - 3307:3306
        options: >-
          --health-cmd "mysqladmin ping -h localhost -uroot -proot"
          --health-interval=10s
          --health-timeout=5s
          --health-retries=5

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r backend/requirements.txt flake8 pytest bandit

      - name: Lint code
        run: flake8 backend/

      - name: Security scan (Python)
        run: bandit -r backend/ || true

      - name: Set DB env vars for tests
        run: |
          echo "DB_HOST=127.0.0.1" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "DB_PORT=3307" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "DB_NAME=test_db" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "DB_USER=root" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "DB_PASSWORD=root" >> $GITHUB_ENV

      - name: Run tests
        run: pytest backend/

      - name: Build backend image
        run: docker build -t student-app:ci ./infra

      - name: Build frontend image
        run: docker build -t student-frontend:ci ./frontend
